website_summaries.verdict: If you're having trouble finding bags that are large enough for generously sized men's shoes, consider these.
pros: Set includes 10 shoe bags with choice of color
Spacious and made of material that repels water
cons: High heels could puncture the bag
Only some color choices feature a transparent window
Black bags are larger than other color choices

customer_reviews.title: I have been looking for some shoe bags for quite sometime now and I'm glad I found this
customer_reviews.text: I am content with the purchase of this product. I have been looking for some shoe bags for quite sometime now and I'm glad I found this. The color black are slightly bigger than the pink. However, my shoes fit in both bags perfectly. I wear tennis shoes size 8.5 (women) to give you an idea.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these after growing tired of using plastic bags for our shoes - lol. These are wonderfully built & large enough for my fiances 'man' shoes. I managed to fit 5 pairs of my sandals into a single bag!! The see-through window worked wonderfully so that i did not have to rummage through the entire suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: brhsenorita

customer_reviews.title: Shoe bags😀🌼👍
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for myself. I ABSOLUTELY LOVE this bags! Helps do the obvious by keeping dirty shoes from my clothes when travelling. Local or international travelers need this. Wish I thought of this! It's the best way to keep everything separate and clean.😀 If you're a traveler this is a must have.. I never travel without mine. Anyway kudos to the inventors! This idea as you know was a major game changer, and winning idea👍👍👍👍👍 💯💯 Only downside, the material used does not stand up well with heels... punches through the bag eventually. Work on that and you'll get 5 stars😕😀
customer_reviews.author: Luv2shop, goodies arrived

customer_reviews.title: Used for our wedding and honeymoon!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy comfortable foam slippers for all of the female guests at my wedding, and wanted something to package them in that would double as a nice heel holder. They were a big hit with all of the ladies! These drawstring bags are made of a nice strong yet breathable material, and you can easily fit a pair of sneakers in them. I ended up with a few leftover bags and used them to pack bathing suits and other garments in my suitcase for the honeymoon, super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Cardenas

customer_reviews.title: I love these bags
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags. I always used to put my shoes in empty plastic Target bags but now they look adorable in these. I wear a women's size 7.5 shoe and I am able to fit tennis shoes and even ankle boots in with no problems. Would fit a couple pairs of flip flops or 2 pairs of flats in each bag as well. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: blondie7700

customer_reviews.title: Must have for travel
customer_reviews.text: This makes organizing while packing easier. I was using ziploc gallon sized bags before which wasn’t environmentally friendly. I mostly use these bags to keep my delicates, socks, and shoes separate from my other travel items. I don’t like to put my delicates to come in direct contact with a hotel dresser drawer ( I know I’m weird). So it’s great to unpack them and just put the whole bag in the drawer. I use these bags on every trip.
customer_reviews.author: BeachyV

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: These were way to small to use as a dust bags for small purses. They work for clutches or wallets but not purses. I still gave 5 stars because they come in handy for odds and ends and are thick and well made.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great for shoes and more
customer_reviews.text: They're very durable, roomy, shoe bags. Does a good job of protecting the shoes and the other contents of your suitcase. Made of a nearly indestructible, woven material. Handy for packing any small item that needs extra protection.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Young

customer_reviews.title: Love these bags...
customer_reviews.text: Durable bags and they are perfect to store my shoes when traveling or simple to keep the dust off. The bags are small but spacious. I have stored sneakers, wedges and 4" heels in these bags comfortably. I would definitely purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: See your shoes
customer_reviews.text: We travel a lot and usually have all my shoes in one large bag. Thought I'd try this method and it's great. Can see which shoes are in what bag.
customer_reviews.author: MawwMaww

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: YOU MUST GET THESE TO PROTECT YOUR SHOES AND ESPECIALLY WHEN TRAVELING. A MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Use these for my daughters dance shoes for her dance competitions when we travel they are very nice very durable
customer_reviews.author: Lori hollander

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I used these for everything on my most recent vacation. They worked well for shoes, electronics, socks etc. I used them like packing cubes for my non clothing items. All of them are still in perfect shape, no holes.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for upcoming trip so haven't used yet but they are as described and look like they will do the trick. Great for dirty or wet shoes to keep suitcase clean.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Payne

customer_reviews.title: What I needed
customer_reviews.text: I got these to store wigs while traveling. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: larger than expected, would fit any size pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: A little stiff, and larger than expected, would fit any size (men or women including very tall platforms). The advantage is that you see what you packed in there.
customer_reviews.author: chismg

customer_reviews.title: The bags keep my shoes from scuffing one another and the little see through window is perfect for sorting and finding what I nee
customer_reviews.text: I used the bags to store my 'off season' shoes. The bags keep my shoes from scuffing one another and the little see through window is perfect for sorting and finding what I need quickly. Plan to purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for ours shoes when we travel! Pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: MadeinTN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for shoes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for shoes, keeping wet towels and gym laundry separated from rest of bag, sorting laundry, everything! I bought 4 packs --- getting more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!! Travel or storage
customer_reviews.text: They are amazing - they hold more than one show at any given time - 3 sets of flats of one pit of heels and a pair of flats, works well - the see through window is the most ingenious invention
customer_reviews.author: Deandra A. Poyser

customer_reviews.title: The bags were paper thin and not of a good quality. I could only fit one shoe in ...
customer_reviews.text: The bags were paper thin and not of a good quality. I could only fit one shoe in the bag...
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Great way to keep your shoes clean and neat
customer_reviews.text: We travel alot, and one thing I have been wanting is something to put my shoes in when we travel. I love that they were pink and also black. I put my husband's in the black and used the pink for me! Great item to keep the clothes clean!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Wood

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: Very practical. nice material. Clearview window is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: marianne bissett

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a useful product
customer_reviews.text: I fly at least once a month for work and I love using these shoe bags! They are incredibly easy to use and do a great job of organizing the different pairs of shoes I bring with me. I even bought them as a gift for my cousin's pending trip to Asia and Europe and she's excited to try them out on her travels.
customer_reviews.author: Shane M

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price. I also use one as a book cover !
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE THEM!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best... I'm on the road every weekend and I carry at least 2 pair of shoes and these are perfect from getting them scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha LaRue

customer_reviews.title: Really big, adds bulk
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for an upcoming trip thinking they would save space, but they are really big, and all the extra material takes up a lot of space I wasn't planning on. I wear a woman's size 11, so I really wouldn't recommend for someone with a more petite foot. If you don't care about space, may be a decent dust cover
customer_reviews.author: Burgh Girl

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for traveling! I used these for a 10 trip to Germany. No more plastic bags for my shoes. And I love the fact that you can pick a color. I love pink!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Hummel

customer_reviews.title: Instead of grocery bags.
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags. So convenient. 5 for my husband's daughter and 5 for me. They work well.

customer_reviews.title: Good for short term use
customer_reviews.text: We used these to store dance shoes for competition and recital. They have been coming apart at the seams with travel or with weekly use. They are good for in home use or with short term use expectations.

customer_reviews.title: Windows
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good so I ordered some more and will order more again. Great price for the quality.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend! Received in a timely manner
customer_reviews.text: Large bag! Large enough for 2 pair of sandals. One for hikers and other Athletic footwear! Would recommend! Received in a timely manner!

customer_reviews.title: I love the color and will buy again for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: These shoe bags are not bulky and keep the shoes well protected. I love the color and will buy again for my daughter.

customer_reviews.title: These are nice great for packing and protecting your shoes and your ...
customer_reviews.text: These are nice great for packing and protecting your shoes and your clothes from your shoes. Cute and pink. Great value for 10 of them!

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your garments clean since shoes are kept in these bags 👍
customer_reviews.text: Gave these bags as a small gift for a girlfriend cruise and everyone loved them! Especially the pink color, made it easy for find our shoes in our huge suitcases. I’d buy them again.

customer_reviews.title: Great for dance shoes
customer_reviews.text: I use these for lots of things: dance shoe bags, keeping items together when traveling. Sturdy, inexpensive, hot pink.

customer_reviews.text: Love the color and size. Big enough to actually use for high heeled shoes

customer_reviews.text: Great convenient shoe bags. My heals didn't poke through the bags. Just the right size, not to small or too big

customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a really well made bags at first. Nice thick material and the window is nice to quickly see what shoe you have in the bag. Howerver it started to rip really bad at the drawstrings after only a few uses.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Travel Addition
customer_reviews.text: They’re so good for traveling and keeping dirt and germs off your clothes. Would definitely purchase additional in the future for moving.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I need these for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I need these for. Sturdy fabric and the window is an added bonus so I can see what shoes I have at a glance. I will be ordering more.

customer_reviews.title: I love them, they are fantastic
customer_reviews.text: These bags are right for my shoes and just right but my sons shoes. I love them, they are fantastic.

customer_reviews.text: Great travel bags. They came in handy for traveling & I love the little window.

customer_reviews.text: Work as advertised. Keeps clothes clean when packed with shoes

customer_reviews.text: Great bags to store shoes, toys and other personal items.

customer_reviews.title: Nice for travel
customer_reviews.text: I used to put my shoes in a plastic bag to put into my luggage when I travel, but now I use these bags instead. If I'm taking sandals I can put 2 pair of sandals in one bag. These are really useful and I don't know what I did without them.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty tough product , I could fit all sizes of heels but none of my boots

customer_reviews.text: Use it for my Climbing shoes to keeps the chalk off of my things in my bag well.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bags
customer_reviews.text: Bags are nicely made. I like the clear opening so you can see what's inside. I will probably order more

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Bought these to hang off the hanger for ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Bought these to hang off the hanger for the tuxes in our wedding for all the groomsmen and they are perfect! They can hold shoes larger than a men's size 13 and accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Feel stiff. Very large
customer_reviews.text: The bags feel stiff and are somewhat heavy. In today' s world every once count when flying...

customer_reviews.title: great use for shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these, took them on our vacation and we were very pleased with the durability and convenience.

customer_reviews.title: everyone loved the bags
customer_reviews.text: I used these a gift bags for a bachelorette party, everyone loved the bags.
customer_reviews.author: B Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Great and afordable!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! Wanted shoes bags for traveling instead of using grocery bags but need multiple bags so I am please with how many I got for the price. I also need bags large enough for my husband size 12 shoes and they fit perfectly. A little large for my size 7 shoes but I don't mind because I can probably fit multiple pairs in one bag. I'm happy with the quality. Was worried they would be an scratchy material but they are soft and seem durable.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good size for my size 10 shoes. The thickness of the bag is great.
customer_reviews.author: Consuela

customer_reviews.title: Love These Bags!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags! I just used them for a 10-day trip. They worked out great. I was able to pack shoes in with my clothing without worrying about my clothes getting dirty from the shoes. I would definitely recommend these shoe bags.
customer_reviews.author: DeeGee

customer_reviews.title: Nice bags, great value
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I put rhinestones on the outside with my daughter's initial to dress it up so my daughter could use it for her dance shoes. We even gave one as a buddy gift.
customer_reviews.author: 1ManArmy

customer_reviews.title: Travel Shoes Bags
customer_reviews.text: I gave 5 each of 10 packs to my mother for her birthday. She likes those. I keep 5 others in my bedroom closet. Shoes bags look beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I used these to hide cables under a machine. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Penny Mosher

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product
customer_reviews.text: These were so convenient for our shoes when we went on a two week Euro-trip. I used to always use plastic bags for my shoes, but these are more reliable and we'll be using them for all of our trips going forward. They fit my shoes (size 6) and my husband's (size 11). I would even put two pairs of sandals in one bag.
customer_reviews.author: bargainbae

customer_reviews.title: Good size and practical
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice. Seem to be sturdy and will keep me organized and other items in my luggage safe from dirty shoes. I was able to easily fit a pair of chunky high heel sandals in one bag. I wonder if the black ones are meant for husbands (I intended mine for my husband) since they are quite a bit larger than the pink ones :-)
customer_reviews.author: liu0502

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bags!
customer_reviews.text: These are great in my gym bag, and when packing for vacation. I wear women's size 9 shoes and they still have room for bigger ones (without feeling *too* big, if that makes sense?). Just drawing the strings keeps them closed. I've even discovered I can fit my surface in one nicely. It doesn't protect it as well as a dedicated case would, but it's great as a layer to prevent clothes from snagging or rubbing off on it... and since the hotel had a glasstop table, I was super glad to have it as a mousepad :D
customer_reviews.author: Elssha

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase - but bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Nice bags. A little bigger than I had envisioned, but it is my own fault for not paying attention to the dimensions before buying. These will easily fit my ladies size 9 running shoes with plenty of room to spare. For sandals and dress shoes, I fully expect to fit at least two to three pairs. One will also make a perfect laundry bag for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great for Kids or Adult Shoes or Purses
customer_reviews.text: I got these bags for my kids shoes because they have to bring a Speedtest pair of shoes to school for inside and PE. As you can tell from the amount of bags that come together I had a few extra. Now that winter is coming around I put my US mens size 11 summer shoes in these bags. My wife likes these becaue she can put her purses in them also. She tells me it is the same material shippers put purses in to protect them. Great product with many uses.
customer_reviews.author: ROBIE

customer_reviews.title: The pink color is flattering
customer_reviews.text: Tugged on one side of fabric to see if it would rip, but stayed and didn't cause a stretch mark in fabric. Cute bags, easy for business product of large gift bag for schools or events. The cosmos logo is on both sides. The color is flattering. Cheap price, but quality. I'm ordering more!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlie07

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent! So many uses, not just for shoes. They fit my husbands size 13 hiking shoes easily with space to spare. We also used them to carry small stuff down to the beach since they have a drawstring and for laundry bags at the end of our trip. We have only used these for one trip so far, but the quality is very good! The material is sturdy and though they are made for shoes, they hold a lot of weight, a few water bottles, snacks and a change of clothes were no problem. Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: O

customer_reviews.title: Holds my size 13 sneakers. Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for traveling to separate your shoes from your other clothes in your bag or locker. I wear size 13 and they hold my dress uniform shoes and my high top sneakers no problem. They are worth the cost If you need something like this. The window is also pretty useful and they seem quite durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Da Cunha Cox

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and large enough for men’s shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are very functional especially with the window. You can see which shoes are in each bag. I also one bag this to hold my hair dryer and brushes at home. I keep my garden gloves in another bag- so these are good for many home uses.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Jagoda

customer_reviews.title: The quality is also good, I took a few of these on a ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. My size 12 shoes fit perfectly in here. I had no problems fitting in low cut boots as well. The quality is also good, I took a few of these on a 2 month trip and not one ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and excellent quality. Glad I ordered them and they serve so many purposes. Never leave home on trips without them and my hubby loves them too. We travel a lots and people are always mentioning them to us how they need to get them some.
customer_reviews.author: Precious

customer_reviews.title: Serves the purpose
customer_reviews.text: Great set of drawstring shoe bags - pink for me, black for my bf! Now we know whose shoes are in which bags.
customer_reviews.author: Doxxies

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely a good deal. These are pretty large and the material was thicker than I expected and I imagine they would hold up with several washes. I used some as dusters for my smaller purses.
customer_reviews.author: Meryl V.

customer_reviews.title: Great for shoe lovers
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this, when I travel I tend to bring a lot of shoes/sneakers and thanks to these bags, my shoes never touch my clean clothes. And when I'm not traveling I also use them to organize my shoe closet, it's less cluttered when I keep my shoes that doesn't come with boxes in these bags.

customer_reviews.title: These were perfect.
customer_reviews.text: These were great! I used them last Christmas to "wrap" packages for family members. Not only did they get a gift, they got to keep the wrappings!
customer_reviews.author: J. Woods

customer_reviews.title: Don’t expect the moon, but they are fit well to purpose
customer_reviews.text: These bags are large. I would say you could fit 3 shoes in the bag... They hold a pair of my size 10.5 shoes with room to spare. The "clear window" makes it easier to see which shoes are inside without having to open them but I still have to open the bags. Tie closure stays put. I use these for snorkel masks and dive equipment too for dry storage. They seem to be doing well so far.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR TRAVEL

product_meta.title: Cosmos 10 Pcs Unisex-Adult Black Color Non-Woven Drawstring Shoe Bags for Travel Carrying, 17-1/2 x 13-1/2 Inches
product_meta.description: Color:BlackThis shoe bag protects clothing from shoes in your suitcase, with these Travel Shoe Bags. These shoe bags are made from Non-Woven & Polypropy lene, water-repellent Non-Woven with a drawstring closure. Sold as a set of 10, you'll never want to travel without the protection of these shoes bags. Perfect for camping, and other travel activities where you're walking on dirty terrain. Also great for keeping dress shoes from getting dusty in the closet.
